4307990.name: Disqualified
4307990.description:
Evaluate. Survive. Don't Crash. In this comedy-physics driving sim, you play as a Driving Examiner. Your job is to grade students on their driving skills, but there’s a catch: your students are absolute lunatics behind the wheel.

Key Features:

  • The Grading Hustle: Watch like a hawk! Deduct points for failing to signal, speeding, or... driving on the sidewalk. Your clipboard is your weapon.

  • Panic Braking: When your student decides a red light is just a 'suggestion' or tries to drag race a semi-truck, hit your dual-control brake to save your life. Timing is everything!

  • Chaos on the Road: From sudden construction zones to rogue pigeons and students who start crying mid-turn—every test is a new nightmare.

  • Hilarious Physics: Watch the driver (and yourself) ragdoll during sudden stops or witness the glorious, over-the-top carnage when you fail to brake in time.

"Buckle up. It’s going to be a bumpy ride... if you make it back at all."
4307990.supported_languages:
英语*, 韩语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
